title: Crane Simulation Project
description: This project is a crane simulation model developed as part of an engineering or robotics experiment. The model is designed to replicate the mechanical behavior and control system of a real-life gantry crane.

title: Polines Data Acquisition
description: This system consists of several main components that work together integrally. First, there is a Slave device connected to various sensors such as PT100, PZEM, Ultrasonic, Analog Input, and Digital Input. This Slave device has communication capabilities using the LoRa protocol.

title: Mixing Machine
description: This project is a development of an automated machine designed to mix tempeh starter (Rhizopus spores) evenly with boiled soybeans. The goal is to ensure consistent fermentation and improve production efficiency. The machine reduces manual labor, maintains hygiene, and provides uniform distribution of the inoculum for high-quality tempeh production.

title: Design  and  Construction  of  an  Internet  of  Things  Trainer  for  ESP32-Based  Sensor  Learning  Applications  with  Modbus  RS485  and LoRa  Communication  Systems  (Final  Project  -  2025)
description: Design and development of an ESP32-based IoT learning trainer kit integrated with various industrial sensors and Modbus RS485 and LoRa communication systems for long-distance data transmission. This project also features AI-based detection (YOLOv8) to complement the visual monitoring system.
